field.name: PDO
field.description: Port Data Output\n This register configures the logic levels that are driven on each general-purpose output pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Logic level 0 is driven on pin provided pin is configured for General Purpose Output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Logic level 1 is driven on pin provided pin is configured for General Purpose Output

field.name: PDI
field.description: Port Data Input\n Reads 0 at the unimplemented pins for a particular device. Pins that are not configured for a digital function read 0. If the Port Control and Interrupt module is disabled, then the corresponding bit in PDIR does not update

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pin logic level is logic 0 or is not configured for use by digital function

field.name: PDD
field.description: Port Data Direction\n Configures individual port pins for input or output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pin is configured as general purpose input, if configured for the GPIO function

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Pin is configured for general purpose output, if configured for the GPIO function

field.name: ACB
field.description: Attribute Check Byte\n This 3 bit field defines the attributes required to access the corresponding GPIO port's programming model

enumeratedValue.name: 0b000
enumeratedValue.description: User nonsecure: Read + Write; User Secure: Read + Write; Privileged Secure: Read + Write

enumeratedValue.name: 0b001
enumeratedValue.description: User nonsecure: Read; User Secure: Read + Write; Privileged Secure: Read + Write

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: User nonsecure: None; User Secure: Read + Write; Privileged Secure: Read + Write

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: User nonsecure: Read; User Secure: Read; Privileged Secure: Read + Write

enumeratedValue.name: 0b100
enumeratedValue.description: User nonsecure: None; User Secure: Read; Privileged Secure: Read + Write

enumeratedValue.name: 0b101
enumeratedValue.description: User nonsecure: None; User Secure: None; Privileged Secure: Read + Write

enumeratedValue.name: 0b110
enumeratedValue.description: User nonsecure: None; User Secure: None; Privileged Secure: Read

enumeratedValue.name: 0b111
enumeratedValue.description: User nonsecure: None; User Secure: None; Privileged Secure: None

field.name: ROB
field.description: Read-Only Byte\n This register bit provides a mechanism to "lock" the configuration state defined by ACB. Once asserted, this bit remains set and attempted writes to the ACB are ignored until the next system reset clears the flag

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the ACB are allowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the ACB are ignored
